summary: Implemented deterministic unit tests for the turtle interpret function in tests/test_turtle.py.

writes.content:
import pytest
from lsysviz.turtle import interpret
from lsysviz.types import Segment


def test_single_F():
    segments = interpret('F', 90, 10)
    assert len(segments) == 1
    assert segments[0] == Segment(0, 0, pytest.approx(0, abs=1e-9), pytest.approx(10, abs=1e-9))


def test_double_F():
    segments = interpret('FF', 90, 10)
    assert len(segments) == 2
    assert segments[0] == Segment(0, 0, pytest.approx(0, abs=1e-9), pytest.approx(10, abs=1e-9))
    assert segments[1] == Segment(pytest.approx(0, abs=1e-9), pytest.approx(10, abs=1e-9), pytest.approx(0, abs=1e-9), pytest.approx(20, abs=1e-9))


def test_F_plus_F():
    segments = interpret('F+F', 90, 10)
    assert len(segments) == 2
    assert segments[0] == Segment(0, 0, pytest.approx(0, abs=1e-9), pytest.approx(10, abs=1e-9))
    assert segments[1] == Segment(pytest.approx(0, abs=1e-9), pytest.approx(10, abs=1e-9), pytest.approx(-10, abs=1e-9), pytest.approx(10, abs=1e-9))


def test_F_minus_F():
    segments = interpret('F-F', 90, 10)
    assert len(segments) == 2
    assert segments[0] == Segment(0, 0, pytest.approx(0, abs=1e-9), pytest.approx(10, abs=1e-9))
    assert segments[1] == Segment(pytest.approx(0, abs=1e-9), pytest.approx(10, abs=1e-9), pytest.approx(10, abs=1e-9), pytest.approx(10, abs=1e-9))


def test_push_pop():
    segments = interpret('F[+F]-F', 90, 10)
    assert len(segments) == 3
    assert segments[0] == Segment(0, 0, pytest.approx(0, abs=1e-9), pytest.approx(10, abs=1e-9))
    assert segments[1] == Segment(pytest.approx(0, abs=1e-9), pytest.approx(10, abs=1e-9), pytest.approx(-10, abs=1e-9), pytest.approx(10, abs=1e-9))
    assert segments[2] == Segment(pytest.approx(0, abs=1e-9), pytest.approx(10, abs=1e-9), pytest.approx(10, abs=1e-9), pytest.approx(10, abs=1e-9))


def test_ignore_unknown_characters():
    segments = interpret('FXF', 90, 10)
    assert len(segments) == 2
    assert segments[0] == Segment(0, 0, pytest.approx(0, abs=1e-9), pytest.approx(10, abs=1e-9))
    assert segments[1] == Segment(pytest.approx(0, abs=1e-9), pytest.approx(10, abs=1e-9), pytest.approx(0, abs=1e-9), pytest.approx(20, abs=1e-9))
